descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve many video categories

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

part.name: part
part.description: The fields parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more video resource properties that the API response will include
part.ai_hint: The fields parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more video resource properties that the API response will include

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: channelId
options.description: The channelId parameter indicates that the API response should only contain resources created by the channel

options.name: forDeveloper
options.description: Whether to restrict the search to only retrieve videos uploaded via the developer's application or website

options.name: publishedAfter
options.description: The publishedAfter parameter indicates that the API response should only contain resources created at or after the specified time

options.name: publishedBefore
options.description: The publishedBefore parameter indicates that the API response should only contain resources created before or at the specified time

options.name: q
options.description: The q parameter specifies the query term to search for

options.name: regionCode
options.description: The regionCode parameter instructs the API to select a video chart available in the specified region. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: relatedToVideoId
options.description: The relatedToVideoId parameter retrieves a list of videos that are related to the video that the parameter value identifies

options.name: videoCategoryId
options.description: The videoCategoryId parameter identifies the video category for which the chart should be retrieved

options.name: videoSyndicated
options.description: Whether to restrict a search to only videos that can be played outside youtube.com

options.name: videoType
options.description: The videoType parameter lets you restrict a search to a particular type of videos

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

options.name: options
Moderate
options.description: YouTube will filter some content from search results and, at the least, will filter content that is restricted in your locale

options.name: None
options.description: YouTube will not filter the search result set

options.name: Strict
options.description: YouTube will try to exclude all restricted content from the search result set

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: defaultLanguage
options.description: The language of the text in the playlist resource's title and description properties. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: description
options.description: The playlist's description

options.name: embeddable
options.description: Whether the video can be embedded on another website

options.name: license
options.description: The video's license

options.name: notifySubscribers
options.description: Whether YouTube should send a notification about the new video to users who subscribe to the video's channel

options.name: privacyStatus
options.description: The playlist's privacy status

options.name: publicStatsViewable
options.description: Whether the extended video statistics on the video's watch page are publicly viewable

options.name: publishAt
options.description: If you set a value for this property, you must also set the status.privacyStatus property to private

options.name: recordingDate
options.description: The date and time when the video was recorded

options.name: selfDeclaredMadeForKids
options.description: Whether the video is designated as child-directed, and it contains the current "made for kids" status of the video

options.name: tags
options.description: Keyword tags associated with the playlist. Mulplie can be defined separated by comma.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

playlistId.name: playlistId
playlistId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
playlistId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

regionCode.name: regionCode
regionCode.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
regionCode.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

categoryId.name: categoryId
categoryId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
categoryId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

rating.name: rating

options.name: Dislike
options.description: Records that the authenticated user disliked the video

options.name: Like
options.description: Records that the authenticated user liked the video

options.name: None
options.description: Removes any rating that the authenticated user had previously set for the video

rating.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'part'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'channel' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'part'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'uploadBanner' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'uploadBanner' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
IF resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'playlistId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'part'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'playlistId'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'part'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'playlist' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'playlistId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'playlist' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'playlistId'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'videoId'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'playlistItemId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'part'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'playlistItemId'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'playlistId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'part'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'playlistItem' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'playlistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'regionCode'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'categoryId'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'videoId'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'videoId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'part'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'video' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'rate' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'videoId'
IF operation == 'rate' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'rating'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'videoId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'regionCode'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'categoryId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'videoCategory' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'videoCategory' THEN SHOW parameter 'regionCode'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'videoCategory' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'videoCategory' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
